name: Virtual VIP Ltd
description:
We are an experienced UK-based team of professionals that provides a customer-focused online telephone answering service to small and large businesses. We’ll provide you with your very own receptionist who answers your calls in your company name when you can’t pick up. We can also review your existing customer service – and help make it perfect. A missed phone call can be a missed business opportunity.
If you can’t always be by the phone we will pick up for you and treat your clients just as you would. Did you know that a busy signal puts off 80% of first time callers – often permanently? With our reliable and flexible virtual phone answering service every single call will be answered within 3 rings. Promise. When we say virtual we don’t mean a robot - we mean a real, qualified human being who gets to know your business and answers your calls and takes a message in a professional and friendly manner when you’re not there to pick up the phone. Like a dedicated employee, but without the costs and with the flexibility.
